title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-12.3 - Manual or automatic-maximum firing rate three gallons per hour or less
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-12.3 - Manual or automatic-maximum firing rate three gallons per hour or less

State Regulations

On all manual or automatic oil-fired boilers having a
firing rate of three gallons per hour or less, the main flame
trial-for-ignition period shall not exceed 90 seconds. Upon flame failure, the
main oil valve shall close automatically within 90 seconds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-12.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
